segments.text: What do you think a job is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , a way to make a living , of course , but beyond that I think a job is a way of developing oneself as a person .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do you see yourself three years from now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn't like to hold a specific title . I just want to enjoy what I am doing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the most important thing to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . What kind of relationship do you think should exist between a boss and his or her employees ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think a company is a place to get work done . Certainly friendly , open relationships among all company employees is important , and I think an employee should be serious about his or her work responsibilities and have a professional relationship with the boss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll have a definite answer from us within a week . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
